name: Around a World
description:
A puzzle game about joining together to make your friends happy. Form orbits with other planets and get your connection to pass over a star to light it up! Light up all the stars in the level to win.

A puzzle game made for the 2021 GMTK Jam in 48 hours.

By:

Yuzu - Programming, Level Design, Sound Design
BenignBrett - Art, Level Design
PhazonMatrix - Music, sound

BGM is a small edit of: Pictures of the Floating World - Pale Tussack
